biotools.summary: This tool does prediction for a censored survival outcome, or a regression outcome, using the “supervised principal component” approach. It is especially useful when the number of features p is >> n, the number of samples, for example in microarray studies.

bioschemas.name: SuperPC
bioschemas.summary: This tool does prediction for a censored survival outcome, or a regression outcome, using the “supervised principal component” approach. It is especially useful when the number of features p is >> n, the number of samples, for example in microarray studies.
